OTHER.description: This state is used if none of the other states below apply

TRANSFERRED_ASSIGNED.description: The job has been transferred to the machine and assigned as current job

SET_UP_ACTIVE.description: The operator prepares the machine for the job

SET_UP_INTERRUPTED.description: The operator has interrupted but not finished the preparation of the machine for the job

SET_UP_FINISHED.description: The operator has finished the preparation of the machine for the job

START_UP_ACTIVE.description: The operator is setting the machine in the start-up phase

JOB_IN_PRODUCTION.description: The machine is producing parts/products for the job

JOB_INTERRUPTED.description: The job is interrupted. The nominal output is not reached

TEAR_DOWN_ACTIVE.description: The operator tears the machine down

TEAR_DOWN_INTERRUPTED.description: Tear-down is interrupted but not finished

OTHER.description: This state is used if none of the other states below apply

TRANSFERRED_ASSIGNED.description: The job has been transferred to the machine and assigned as current job

SET_UP_ACTIVE.description: The operator prepares the machine for the job

SET_UP_INTERRUPTED.description: The operator has interrupted but not finished the preparation of the machine for the job

SET_UP_FINISHED.description: The operator has finished the preparation of the machine for the job

START_UP_ACTIVE.description: The operator is setting the machine in the start-up phase

JOB_IN_PRODUCTION.description: The machine is producing parts/products for the job

JOB_INTERRUPTED.description: The job is interrupted. The nominal output is not reached

TEAR_DOWN_ACTIVE.description: The operator tears the machine down

TEAR_DOWN_INTERRUPTED.description: Tear-down is interrupted but not finished

OTHER.description: This state is used if none of the other states below apply

NO_PRODUCTION.description: The machine does not produce any parts/products

START_UP.description: The machine is producing parts/products in the start-up phase. So the correct settings of the machines are not reached.

READY_FOR_PRODUCTION.description: The machine is producing parts/products, the correct settings of the machines are reached but the production is not yet released (e.g. waiting for release from quality assurance)

PRODUCTION.description: The machine is producing parts/products.  In semi-automatic mode also during waiting time (e.g. for manual loading/unloading of parts) ProductionStatus remains in this state (time out possible if e.g. cycle time exceeds a pre-defined limit)

DRY_RUN.description: The machine is moving without material

Unit.title: EUInformation
Unit.description: Engineering unit of the parameter. If the Type of Defaultvalue is not a Number, then the Unit shall be empty

Value.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.
